main event: A civilian woman in Dayton, Ohio observed a bright light in the sky that was stationary for 5-10 minutes, then moved slowly to the east and disappeared.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright, yellowish-white light that was oblong shaped and hovered low on the horizon.
The woman observed the object through a window and it was visible due to its position at the time.
The intelligence analysis concluded that the sighting was likely an astronomical body, not an unidentified flying object.
There were no photographs or physical evidence collected for this sighting.
The sighting was reported to the U.S. Air Force's Project Blue Book program for investigation.
